options.darknessEffectScale.tooltip: Controls how much the Darkness effect pulses when a Warden or Shrek Shrieker gives it to you.
advancements.adventure.avoid_vibration.d: Sneak near a Shrek Sensor or Warden to prevent it from detecting you
advancements.adventure.kill_mob_near_scu: Kill a mob near a Shrek Catalyst
